summary: This is a simple re-texture of the Blade of Woe to make it look bloodier.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Bloodier Blade of Woe
Version: 1.0
Date: 01/30/2012
Category: Models and Textures
Author(s): Somnyus


Description
===========
This is a simple re-texture of the Blade of Woe to make it look bloodier.


Install
=======
Extract files to C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
If asked to merge with existing texture folder click \'yes\'


Uninstall
=========
Delete the files/folders associated with the mod:
- textures/weapons/bladeofwoe.dds
- textures/weapons/bladeofwoe_n.dds


Incompatibility
===============
This will conflict with any mod that alters the same texture files.


Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None.


History
=======
1.0, 2012/01/30 - Initial release.


Contact
=======
You can find me on the official Elder Scrolls forums as \'Somnyus\'
You can find me on SkyrimNexus as \'Somnyus\'
You can find me on http://www.skyrimrealestate.com/forum as \'Somnyus\'
You can send me an email here: Somnyus AT gmail DOT com


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Skyrim Nexus for being a great host.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.


Tools Used
==========
WinRar
BSA Commander: http://tes.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3311
NIFSkope: http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
Photoshop: http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop.html
LHammonds\' Readme Generator: http://hammondslegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp


Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that 
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.
author: Somnyus
